prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a playful demeanor and a shell.
Imagine a small blue creature that loves to splash around in ponds.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a turtle with aquatic abilities.
Show me a cute Pokemon that enjoys swimming in the ocean.
Make a design for a water-type Pokemon that is friendly and curious.
I want a blue turtle-like Pokemon that can battle effectively in water.
Give me a character concept for a small, cheerful water creature.
